summary: App with Pro features: free for the owner's account, costs $20 for other users
architectural_notes: Pro feature access controlled by Internet Identity
Payment system for $20 Pro upgrade for non-owner accounts

existing_features.title: Update frontend Pro upgrade UI to reflect that the owner has free Pro access automatically
Display '$20 to upgrade' messaging in ProFeaturesModal for non-owner accounts

new_feature_requests.summary: Pro badge with popup showing features and $20 upgrade option
Free Pro access for owner's Internet Identity account
$20 payment requirement for Pro features for all other users
Implement backend logic to automatically grant Pro subscription status to the owner's Internet Identity account without payment
Ensure all other user accounts require a $20 USD payment to access Pro features
